title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate apparent domestic shooting off Ogeechee Road
content:
Savananah-Chatham police are investigating an apparent domestic shooting on Cylo Circle off Ogeechee Road.
Two people were shot about 7:20 p.m., according to Michelle Gavin, Savannah-Chatham police spokeswoman.
Both people were transported to the hospital and police are investigating the incident, Gavin said
